text: Habenaria nigrescens is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is found in Cameroon and Nigeria. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical high-altitude grassland. It is threatened by habitat loss. == Sources == * nigrescens Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Orchids of Cameroon Category:Orchids of Nigeria Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Habenaria nigrescens
